metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28834 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Kramdown before 2.3.1 does not restrict Rouge formatters to the Rouge::Formatters namespace, and thus arbitrary classes can be instantiated.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28834` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

kramdown - 1.17.0-4ubuntu0.2
ruby-kramdown - 1.17.0-4ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-kramdown package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.17.0-4ubuntu0.2').
